Pithoragarh, Rudraprayag, TehriGarhwal, UdhamSinghNagar, Uttarkashi

This app is meant to inform people about the demise of their near and dear ones.

 This app is purely made to inform the people about the loss of a person and it does not mean to hurt the sentiments of the people of any religion or any caste in any way or in any other sense.

 Any demise published in this app has been published after proper verification and all the records of the publisher are adequately maintained.Any misinformation on the part of publisher will make him accountable for any incorrect information provided by him and stringent actions will be taken against him.

This app will also help those people who are financially not well off to publish the demise of their loved and Respected once and inform the poeple about the loss.
